title: Sentiment Analysis from Financial News
content:
## NLP in Finance

Market moves are often driven by news before charts update. NLP allows us to quantify text.

### Approaches

1.  **Lexicon-Based**: Counting positive/negative words (e.g., Loughran-McDonald dictionary specific to finance).
2.  **Transformer Models**: BERT, FinBERT. These understand context (e.g., "short" has a different meaning in finance than general English).

### Pipeline

Scrape headlines -> Tokenize -> Model Inference -> Sentiment Score (-1 to 1) -> Merge with Price Data as a feature.
